title: BRIEF-Pacific Energy Receives Raised Bid From QIC Private Capital
text:
BRIEF-Pacific Energy Receives Raised Bid From QIC Private Capital

Stock Markets 55 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 20:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pacific Energy Receives Raised Bid From QIC Private Capital Sept 13 (Reuters) - Pacific Energy Ltd : * PACIFIC ENERGY BOARD RECEIVES QIC MATCHING LETTER * RECEIVED FROM QGIF SWAN BIDCO PTY LT A LETTER COMMUNICATING ITS PROPOSED MATCHING TERMS * PACIFIC ENERGY BOARD IS CONSIDERING REVISED QIC OFFER * QIC SUBMITS MATCHING LETTER TO PACIFIC ENERGY OUTLINING AN OFFER OF $1.085 PER SHARE * QIC SUBMITS MATCHING LETTER TO CO OUTLINING OFFER OF $1.085 PER SHARE MATCHING CONSIDERATION AS PUT FORWARD BY OPTRUST/ICG CONSORTIUM * QIC INDICATED THAT IT WILL PAY ADDITIONAL $0.005/SHARE TO CO'S SHAREHOLDERS IF BREAK FEE OF $2.5M IS NOT PAID TO OPTRUST/ICG CONSORTIUM

BRIEF-Pacific Energy Receives Raised Bid From QIC Private Capital
description: BRIEF-Pacific Energy Receives Raised Bid From QIC Private Capital
